lead_paragraph: ANGELO--John. The Board of Trustees and families of Ocean Beach Club mourn the passing of John Angelo. John was a longtime member of Ocean Beach Club and he will be deeply missed. Our thoughts are with his wife, Judy, and all the members of the Angelo family. William Herrman II, President, Shawn Wallach, Secretary 1/3
